EmailTemplate.name: Pre Conference Client Outreach: The Conference Board NY
EmailTemplate.subject: Will you be attending The Conference Board?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Will you be attending The Conference Board in New York on March 8th and 9th? If so, I would love to schedule some time to catch up.
Livongo will host a session with PepsiCo, titled Proving Financial Impact and Business Model for Chronic Condition Management, on March 8th from 3:00 pm - 3:50 pm. Livongo Chief Commercial Officer, Jim Pursley, will join Magda Rusinowski, PepsiCo Director of US Health Benefits, to discuss Livongo’s clinical outcomes and measurable financial impact.
In addition to Jim and Magda’s session, please save the date for Livongo’s VIP event on March 7th from 6:00 - 9:00 pm. The event is hosted at the Attic, and we are co-sponsoring the evening with Castlight and Hinge Health. At the event, there will be plenty of networking opportunities, cocktails, and a fun appearance by the Bumby’s. If you haven’t heard of them yet, we aren’t judging, but they might be. More about this funky New York-based anonymous duo here. We feel that this will be a fun opportunity to set the tone for a great conference and provide a great opportunity to catch up. RSVP for the event here.
While at the conference, we want to sit down with you for an on-camera interview to discuss your experience with Livongo. Our past testimonial videos have been extremely impactful with prospective clients and we would love to feature your feedback on the program.
Looking forward to catching up soon.
Best regards,
